lead_paragraph: The Toronto Blue Jays were the division’s big spenders last year, and they were rewarded for their extravagance with a second-place finish that dumped the Boston Red Sox uncharacteristically into third. Stunned by their failure to make the playoffs, the Red Sox made sure that this time around they were the big spenders. And did they ever spend big.
